page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Cafe’s QUICKGUIDE

Introduction Whether spread across sunny pavements or hidden in quiet corners, Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Click here to return to Vence Magazine Cafe’s QUICKGUIDE

Enjoy a drink in our lounge bar while watching our huge screen. Or explore our menu of flavours at pocket-friendly prices. Watch our chef prepare your meal, while you relax on the terrace surrounded by trees. 25 place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)9 54 88 12 70 Email: info@onlyvous.com www.onlyvous.com Only Vous Adresse 25 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France 09h00-00h00.

9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Cofféa Discover the variety of our coffes, teas and chocolates in our shop. 9bis Place Clémenceau - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 59 23 58 E-Mail: pascalsergent@yahoo.fr Adresse 9 Place Clemenceau 06140 Vence, France

A real artist, Frederic invites you to savour the natural flavours of his icecreams. More than 60 creations in the purist tradition, including a large organic range, Enjoy now or take away ! 10 Place du grand jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 59 16 43 E-Mail: contact@rivadolce.fr www. rivadolce.fr 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Riva Dolce Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France

9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Pâtisserie Palanque A. Pâtisserie Palanque et Fils SARL 37 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 02 24 ​ B. Morellini Sarl 37 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 24 29 85 ​ 37 avenue Marcelin Maurel - à proximité de Vence, Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes- Côte d'Azur, France Palanque pastry shop and its team welcome you in their sweet paradise, where three generations have perpetuated the good taste of specialities, such as the famous ‘craquelin vençois’. 37 avenue Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 58 02 24 E-Mail: lecraquelin@patisseriepalanque.fr www. patisseriepalanque.com

Restarant, bar, brasserie and tea room at the entrance of the Historic City. Specialities: homemade paella, ‘moules frites’. Brasserie services: meats, fish, pasta, large selection of wine by the glass. Lunch menu from12.90€. 11-13 Place du Peyra - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 58 67 63 E-Mail: info@bistrodupeyra.eu www.bistrodupeyra.eu Le Bistro du Peyra 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France

0830h00-19h00. Open after 19h00 on reservation. Square Café Adresse 9 Place Clemenceau 06140 Vence, France Pancakes and salads served from 8h30 to 19h00. Daily special at Euro10. Open after 19h00 only on reservation. Quiet terrace. Drinks and Malongo coffee. 44 Avenue Colonel Meyère - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 67 58

A recognised meeting place for International clientele in the heart of historic Vence. Join in lively conversation with friendly expat residents and multilingual staff; learn about local events; discover ways to make your sejour in Vence more enjoyable. Henry’s - a place of character where people of character choose to meet... Place du Grand Jardin- 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 58 67 83 www.henrysbar.eu 6h30-23h00/closed on wednesdays Henry’s Bar Henry's Bar, à proximité de Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France A. Henry's Bar 48 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France ​ +33 4 93 58 67 83 ​

La Regence Café Adresse 10 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France La Regence café welcomes you in a new refined decor. A mezzanine lounge bar for you candlelight dinners, birth- days, family dinners, seminaries and banquets. Everyday non-stop restaurant with traditional quality cooking. 10 Place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 24 02 10 E-Mail: la-regence-cafe@wanadoo.fr www. laregencecafe.com

Restarant, bar, brasserie and café at the Place du Grand Jardin. 4 Place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 24 21 15 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. La Victoire Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France

06h45-20h00/Sunday: 07h45-13h00. La Pergola Adresse 32 Avenue de la Résistance 06140 Vence, France The Brasserie ‘La Pergola’ offers you traditional cuisine, quick and efficient service with its restaurant of 130 seats of which 50 are situated on a sunny roof top terrace. 32 ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 58 02 34 E-Mail: snclapergola@orange.fr

Since his very first creations, Leonidas’ recipe for success is based on the virtue of impeccable freshness. Today, Leoni- das makes more than 100 varieties of Belgian chocolates of the highest quality and freshness – always using chocolate made of 100% pure cocoa butter. This summer we also opened a café !!! 22 Place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 24 63 03 9h00-12h00/14h30-19h00. Leonidas Adresse 13 Place du Peyra 06140 Vence, France

18h00-00h00. Every day in season. K’fé Malté Adresse 16 Rue du Marché 06140 Vence, France At the K’fé Malté, you’re spoilt for choice ! We serve 50 beers, all manufatured in France, in traditional breweries, not feeling dizzy ? We also offer wines and fruit juices, platters of charcutterie, cheeses, soup and delicious ‘tartines’ ! 16, rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 32 52 36 E-Mail: kfemalte@gmail.com

Terrace café and restaurant, recommended by the “Guide du Routard”, serving traditional cuisine, speciality bruschetta. Parking in Place du Grand Jardin. 13 Place du Grand Jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0) 4 93 58 64 31 www.letroquetdevence.com Le Troquet Adresse 13 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France
MAGAZINE CLICK TOWATCH de Vence GUIDE TO VENCE Contact info@worldondvd.com 17, Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France Siret No 532 475 688 00018 MAGAZINE DE VENCE AUTUMN 2013

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
